objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Romance lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to education and learning in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about education and learning using slang register
Students create original romance themed content about education and learning in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Romance story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using slang register in romance context
Character B: Responding in slang register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
